page.title: 07Early Schooling in Ditchling
page.content: The Ditchling Toddler Group for the under 5's meets twice a week and is an opportunity for the young mums to share experiences over coffee whilst their children explore a variety of simple puzzles,rag_books and brightly coloured toys.The confidence the children gain here makes the transition to the infant department of St. Margaret's C.E.Primary School much less traumatic.This new school in the centre of Ditchling won a National Design Award amd provides an attractive environment for learning. Large airy classrooms,a soundproof room for rowdy activities plus teach_ ing aids including computers,video and television combine to make the six years of Primary schooling profitable ones.At the age of 11 most of the children complete their schooling at Lewes Priory Comprehensive School.
